column5: BCLI Perfect day to buy The stock is extremely oversold Senator Cruzs letter and June 12 meeting could push up approval Tariffs with China and Mexico dont effect BCLI

BCLI Another symposium another CC As stated a while back I dont see a remedy to elevate the Stock Price other than significant News not announcements of CC or symposium participations etc In the 6 to 7 yrs that I am invested we got nowhere at current price I am losing I hope a competitor will not beat us to the finish line you never know Years ago they announced a Canadian HE or Fasttrack and other good stuff but it got forgotten Updates for all previous points needed desperately Good luck to all
